verses.roman:
tato 'medhya-mayaṁ varṣaṁ
balvalena vinirmitam
abhavad yajña-śālāyāṁ
so 'nvadṛśyata śūla-dhṛk

synonyms: tataḥ—then; amedhya—abominable things; mayam—full of; varṣam—a rain; balvalena—by Balvala; vinirmitam—produced; abhavat—occurred; yajña—of the sacrifice; śālāyām—upon the arena; saḥ—he, Balvala; anvadṛśyata—appeared after this; śūla—a trident; dhṛk—carrying.
translation: Next, onto the sacrificial arena came a downpour of abominable things sent by Balvala, after which the demon himself appeared, trident in hand.
